data.name: Richie's Plank Experience
data.description:
Richie's Plank Experience was designed to invoke the strongest possible emotions in the shortest possible time. Test your fear of heights or entertain your friends and family as they walk the plank 80 stories high and experience terrifying real fear, knees weak and palms sweaty!

The plank setup has been vastly improved through the use of immersive Mixed Reality on Meta Quest 2, 3 and Pro devices. Adjust the position, rotation and dimensions of your in game plank to match your real world plank or create a virtual plank right in your living room!

Once you have mastered the art of walking the plank, crank it up a notch and see if you can make it through Nightmare mode. Our Halloween themed experience is a great way to scare you and your guests during the spooky season.

Have you ever wondered what it feels like to fly? With our Hero Academy, you can fly through the city like a superhero, take out rockets or fight fires.

We even have a Christmas themed VR experience the whole family can enjoy. Our Santa Simulator is great for kids and family gatherings during Christmas time.

Warning: This game invokes a near-instant emotional reaction. Due to the nature of virtual reality, this experience can affect your balance, cause dizziness and affect your decision making ability. Follow the in-game Safety Guidelines to reduce the risk of serious injury or harm.

changelog.change_log:
* Made gifts spawn in exact starting positions and start simulating in virtual space immediately to eliminated any physics issues
* Reduced respawn time of gifts
* Removed any physics starting issues with change to simulation architecture
* Further tweaked colliders to clear the exit button regardless of what gifts might be there
* Moved velocity calculations to lateupdate to remove race conditions
* Re-baked canyon to allow build
* Removed probuilder mesh from RPE scene that was causing build issue due to malformed color array
* Made clear separation of resetting gifts and respawning gifts
* Gave gifts the authority to handle the behaviour of their reset and respawn orientation
* Fixed bug where hand interaction pinch was working intermittently for UI elements such as "next" button
* Fixed bug where going back to EULA 2nd time would not show next button, making user stuck
* Fixed bad scale on the dlc panel in some edge cases
* Fixed issue where dlc panel incorrectly opens when leaving hero academy instead of on arrive at plank
* Replaced shooting star particle shader in order to fix culling / weird render order issue
Hot fix to address mipmapping issues.
Hotfix to remove FFR effect on Quest 3.

Changlog 1.8.42:
Bug fixes
- Fixed a bug where the nightmare mode phone table appears purple
- Fixed a bug where the Hero Academy podiums appear in incorrect modes.

Bug fixes:
- Anti Aliasing is now re-enabled.
- The invisible button on the Safety Warning is now removed.

- Hand tracking now available.
- Added Grip detection for grabbing. Now grabbing can be performed by naturally gripping your hands as well as pinching the index finger.
- Hand no longer pushes objects away when attempting to grab.
- Added a "Recenter" button in the game menu.
- New hand appearance (blue)
- System gesture hand appearance (yellow) to indicate that system gestures can be performed (menu button and Oculus Home button)
- Fixed a bug where multiple select sounds play when the hand enters the nightmare mode elevator panel.
- Fixed a bug where the Quest controllers appear on the calibration room screen.
- Fixed a bug where selecting lasers appear between the player's eyes when a hand loses tracking.
Updated the billboard with the DIGNITY message.
